name: Grand Augur
details:
Analog distortionOverflowing with organic amp-like distortion tones, natural tube compression and a tight but rich tonal character, Grand Augur Distortion IS the sound of Rock N Roll.  Now put all of that in a compact metal enclosure with true bypass, and served to you at a price that'll make your endorphin-levels shoot through the roof, and you got a shiny one-way ticket to rock heaven!
Natural tube-like distortion
Wide gain range - with a rich and tight tonal character
True Bypass and Top-mounted jacks
http://www.tcelectronic.com/grand-augur-distortion/
